activateLearningModeModal.activateLearni:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Activate Learning Mode modal
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Activate Learning Mode (modal heading)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Activate Learning Mode' modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Activate Learning Mode"
activateLearningModeModal.paragraph1:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about the effects of activating Learning Mode
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Activate Learning Mode (modal content)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Activate Learning Mode' modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Activating Learning Mode will enable Concepts and Learning Exercises on this track. However, it will lock Exercises for which you have not yet completed the prerequisites. You will still have access to any exercises you have already started."
activateLearningModeModal.warning:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational warning about the flexibility of Learning Mode
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Activate Learning Mode (modal warning section)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Activate Learning Mode' modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You can switch in and out of Learning Mode at any time."
activateLearningModeModal.activateLearni:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm and activate Learning Mode
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Activate Learning Mode (modal action button)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Activate Learning Mode' modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Activate Learning Mode"
leaveTrackModal.youreAboutToLeave:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating the user is about to leave a track
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Leave Track (modal heading)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Leave Track' modal
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "You’re about to leave the {track.title} track."
leaveTrackModal.noLongerInterested:
**Functional Purpose**: Follow-up message asking if the user is still interested in the track
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Leave Track (modal content)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Leave Track' modal
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "No longer interested in learning {track.title}? No problem!"
leaveTrackModal.leave:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Leave' tab
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Leave Track (tab)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Leave Track' modal and views tab options
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Leave"
leaveTrackModal.leavePlusReset:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Leave + Reset' tab
**UI Location**: Track Menu → Leave Track (tab)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Leave Track' modal and views tab options
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Leave + Reset"
